about_the_game:
A simple, unpretentious, event based eroge RPG with no combat and a beautiful, sexually curious female protagonist. You play as Cleome, a hot, single elf from a fictional fantasy world. Cleome get teleported to a fictional modern age world. Cleome needs a large sum of money to return back to her world. And how does an elf from a different world make money in an eroge?

By investing into her education and then smartly investing with the money she makes with good career choices.

NO, she has lots of wanton sex, you silly goose.

Featuring over 50 unique CGs, 14 Live2D animations and developed by the talented Sensouya-san, and localized into English and Chinese by our friends at Cursed Atelier, and localized into Russian by our friend godesu, we bring you Modern Pink Elf RPG! An eroge you can finish in a day, or take your time in multiple sessions. Featuring a standard gallery room for all the many, many scenes you'll unlock, this is an eroge for when you don't need your eroges to be any more than a simple eroge featuring a pink haired elf having lots of sex. No worlds to save, no tear jerking trauma to uncover, no empires to overthrow, no gods to slay. I came for the elf, and I stayed until I came.

Playtime
Around 8+ hours to complete all endings and scenes.
Less if you just use CTRL to skip through most of the text.

Controls
Can be played with keyboard only, gamepad only, or keyboard + mouse.

Note
Modern Pink Elf RPG is made with RPG Maker MV, which isn’t known to work well with older computers or laptops.
Please close your browser and other extra running programs before playing Modern Pink Elf RPG.

Disclaimer
All characters involved in any sexual act in Modern Pink Elf RPG are over 20 years old.

highlighted.name: And Thanks for All the Fish

content_descriptors.notes: Contains explicit graphic content and text descriptions about the female protagonist engaged in casual sex, anal sex, group sex, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, sexual harassment, wanton sex, prostitution, blackmail, multiple partners, cheating, light BDSM, etc. and is not suitable for all ages.

name: Modern Pink Elf RPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on a SDD is highly recommended. Closing other programs especially browsers while running the game is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on a SDD is highly recommended. Closing other programs especially browsers while running the game is recommended.

short_description: Oh no buddy! Cleome, a pink haired elf from a fantasy world is stuck inside the washing machine known as the modern world and she is shaking her hips while asking for your help! As a cultured member of society, how can you help her? Turn your brain off and just enjoy the ride, you deserve it.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
